name: v1_dogs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dogs_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Detailed, qualitative information on over 200 different breeds of dogs. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/dogs.
API description: Get a list of dog breeds matching specified parameters. Returns at most 20 results. To access more than 20 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

offset.description: Number of results to offset for pagination. Defaults to None.

energy.description: How much energy the breed has. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates low energy and 5 indicates high energy.

protectiveness.description: How likely the breed is to alert strangers. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates minimal alerting and 5 indicates maximum alerting.

max_weight.description: Maximum weight of the breed in pounds. Defaults to None.

min_weight.description: Minimum weight of the breed in pounds. Defaults to None.

trainability.description: How easy it is to train the breed. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates the breed is very difficult to train and 5 indicates the breed is very easy to train.

shedding.description: How much hair the breed sheds. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates no shedding and 5 indicates maximum shedding.

name.description: Name of the dog breed. Defaults to 'golden retriever'.

min_height.description: Minimum height of the breed in inches. Defaults to None.

barking.description: How vocal the breed is. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates minimal barking and 5 indicates maximum barking.

max_height.description: Maximum height of the breed in inches. Defaults to None.

max_life_expectancy.description: Maximum life expectancy of the breed in years. Defaults to None.

min_life_expectancy.description: Minimum life expectancy of the breed in years. Defaults to None.
